binding.banner.description: Bind your account to continue. Supply your crypto into a lending pool, accumulate rewards and borrow against your positions.
binding.banner.title: Borrow on Hydration
borrow.cap.tooltip: Maximum amount available to borrow is {{ value, number(notation: 'compact'; maximumFractionDigits: 2) }} {{ tokenSymbol }} ({{ usdValue, currency(notation: 'compact'; maximumFractionDigits: 2) }})
borrow.table.title: Assets to borrow
borrowed.table.title: Your borrows

market.table.title: Available assets
risk.description: Your health factor and loan to value determine the assurance of your collateral. To avoid liquidations you can supply more collateral or repay borrow positions.
risk.hf.description: Safety of your deposited collateral against the borrowed assets and its underlying value.
risk.hf.hint: If the health factor goes below 1, the liquidation of your collateral might be triggered.
risk.ltv.description: Your current loan to value based on your collateral supplied.
risk.ltv.hint: If your loan to value goes above the liquidation threshold your collateral supplied may be liquidated.
risk.ltv.title: Current LTV
risk.title: Liquidation risk parameters
searchAssets: Search by token name or symbol...
supplied.table.title: Your supplies
supply.assetCannotBeCollateral: Asset cannot be used as collateral.
supply.cap.tooltip: Maximum amount available to supply is {{ value, number(notation: 'compact'; maximumFractionDigits: 2) }} {{ tokenSymbol }} ({{ usdValue, currency(notation: 'compact'; maximumFractionDigits: 2) }})
supply.isolatedCollateral.description: In Isolation mode you cannot supply other assets as collateral for borrowing. Assets used as collateral in Isolation mode can only be borrowed to a specific debt ceiling.
supply.isolatedCollateral.title: Asset can only be used as collateral in isolation mode only.
supply.table.title: Assets to supply
tooltip.debtCeilingLimits: Debt ceiling limits the amount possible to borrow against this asset by protocol users. Debt ceiling is specific to assets in isolation mode and is denoted in USD.
tooltip.isolatedAsset: Isolated assets have limited borrowing power and other assets cannot be used as collateral.
tooltip.liquidationPenalty: When a liquidation occurs, liquidators repay up to 50% of the outstanding borrowed amount on behalf of the borrower. In return, they can buy the collateral at a discount and keep the difference (liquidation penalty) as a bonus.
tooltip.liquidationThreshold: This represents the threshold at which a borrow position will be considered undercollateralized and subject to liquidation for each collateral. For example, if a collateral has a liquidation threshold of 80%, it means that the position will be liquidated when the debt value is worth 80% of the collateral value.
tooltip.maxLTV: The Maximum LTV ratio represents the maximum borrowing power of a specific collateral. For example, if a collateral has an LTV of 75%, the user can borrow up to 0.75 worth of ETH in the principal currency for every 1 ETH worth of collateral.
